algorithm_technique: Frequency counting: use character counts to build the longest palindrome.
problem_summary_simple: Find the length of the longest palindrome that can be built using letters from a given string.
problem_summary_technical: Count character frequencies; pair up characters, allowing at most one character with an odd count in the center.
key_insights: A palindrome can be formed by pairing up characters. All characters with even counts can be fully utilized.
For characters with odd counts, we can use all but one instance to form pairs.
At most one character with an odd count can be placed in the center of the palindrome.
